author: dkulp
msg: JAXB Code generated wsdl extensor support.
Added utilities to use JAXB generated classes for WSDL extensors.
Addes JMS and http-conf schemas so the extensors for those will

author: andreasmyth
msg: Added basic support for plugin management.
Defined interfaces and simple implementations for two types of plugins: application (process) wide or bus specific (the latter have a PerBusPluginState).
Also added directory src/org/objectweb/celtix/common which we could start populating with common utilities, e.g. I added a base class for localisable exceptions in the i18 subdirectory.

author: dkulp
msg: Created a WSDLManager for the bus to use to cache/manage
wsdl documents used by the application.

author: dkulp
msg: Add wsdl4j jar for use as our wsdl model/extensor api
Add etc/eclipse to store various eclipse project settings
to make it easier to configure eclipse

author: andreasmyth
msg: Added interfaces for transport and handler factory managers.
Also added simple implementation for the same in the bus package. Modified accessors in the Bus interface accordingly.
